artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Kikuyōtei Rokō; Publisher: Daikokuya Kinnosuke
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
inscription: UL: 梵国（てんぢく）の半俗太非華陽を愛 / して艶香に反し既に国政 / をみだして閻浮台を寧魔 / 麼す豈與令にいりて菩戒 / をさまたぐるものから国民大に / 患て竟に大乱をこそ引いだ / したり / 菊葉亭露光記
portfolio: One Hundred Tales from Japan and China (Wakan hyaku monogatari 和漢百物語)
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
title: Keyblock drawing for Lady Huayang
